items_data.name: potion
items_data.game_description: Restores 200 HP of one character.
items_data.description: Restores 200 HP of one unit. Damages zombies.

items_data.name: hi-potion
items_data.game_description: Restores 1000 HP of one character.
items_data.description: Restores 1000 HP of one unit. Damages zombies.

items_data.name: x-potion
items_data.game_description: Fully restores HP of one character.
items_data.description: Fully restores HP of one unit (maximum of 9,999 HP). zamages Zombies.

items_data.name: mega-potion
items_data.game_description: Restores 2000 HP to each party member.
items_data.description: Restores 2000 HP to each party member. Damages Zombies.

items_data.name: ether
items_data.game_description: Restores 100 MP of one character.
items_data.description: Restores 100 MP of one unit. Lowers MP of zombies.

items_data.name: turbo ether
items_data.game_description: Restores 500 MP of one character.
items_data.description: Restores 500 MP of one unit. Lowers MP of zombies.

items_data.name: phoenix down
items_data.game_description: Revives one character from KO.
items_data.description: Revives one character from KO with half of their max HP (maximum of 9,999 HP). Damages zombies and instant KO's them, if they're not immune to life.

items_data.name: mega phoenix
items_data.game_description: Revives party from KO.
items_data.description: Revives party from KO and fully restores HP of revived characters (maximum of 9,999 HP). Damages zombies and instant KO's them, if they're not immune to life.

items_data.name: elixir
items_data.game_description: Fully restores one character's HP & MP.
items_data.description: Fully restores one unit's HP & MP (maximum of 9,999 HP and 999 MP). Damages zombies.

items_data.name: megalixir
items_data.game_description: Fully restores HP & MP of party.
items_data.description: Fully restores HP & MP of party (maximum of 9,999 HP and 999 MP). Damages zombies.
